conversation.message: Remove the brackets and simplify (2x + y)².

To simplify (2x + y)², expand it as (2x + y)(2x + y). Use the distributive property (FOIL method): Multiply 2x by 2x to get 4x², 2x by y to get 2xy, y by 2x to get 2xy, and y by y to get y². Combine all the terms: 4x² + 2xy + 2xy + y² simplifies to 4x² + 4xy + y². The simplified expression is: 4x² + 4xy + y². Do you understand this step?
